reviews.review_msg: Econ 450 with Stephen was a great experience. While the class may seem intimidating at first, his marking is generous as long as you follow the clear expectations and guidelines he presents throughout the semester. If you are a good writer with a mind for economics, you will succeed. He has a wealth of knowledge that he readily shares if asked.

I thought he was a great prof for this particular course. He gives you the ability to research something that's interesting to you, and grants a lot of independence. He won't spoon feed you, you are required to actually think for yourself.

I know the smiley face here will not be great, but I really liked this class and Easton was pretty good.  You WILL need a lot of help in doing your paper and it will be tough getting it from Easton because he is not always clear and everybody in the class will be wanting help too.  It's a tough course (it's like taking 2 classes) but well worth it.
